column2: it is all executed well and you will get some very tasty food.  I had the katsu pork sandwich
column3: and I would say it was on par with among the best Hoosier pork tenderloins I have had (and I'm quite an aficionado).  The addition of cabbage and vinegar and hoisin sauce really brightened it up too.  The onion rings and fries were well executed
column4: too.   The "fat elvis" cake was spectacular.  Not too sweet
column7: and smokiness of the bacon were all balanced out.
